name: J.League Jikkyou Winning Eleven 3
summary:
World Soccer Jikkyou Winning Eleven 3 is a Sports game, developed by KCET and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 1998.

Although it lacked FIFPro licence, the European releases featured Italian striker Fabrizio Ravanelli along with German goalkeeper Andreas Koepke (on German, French and Spanish releases) or English midfielder Paul Ince (on British and Italian releases) on the cover, and the North American release featured Colombian player Carlos Valderrama.
